author: felixweber
title: After Town Hall by Catalyst Swarm
description: Town Hall is attended by highly engaged participants of the Cardano ecosystem. They need a moderated space for discussion and networking.

author: felixweber
title: Idea Fest by Catalyst Swarm
description: There is a lack of interaction between proposers and voters and its hard for Proposers to reach out to voters to present their projects

author: matthiasksieber
title: Haskell & Coffee ☕
description: There are not many ways for new Haskell developers to learn and exchange knowledge with experienced devs in a decentralized ecosystem.

author: levendozcelik
title: More activities with investors
description: People have been investing and holding coins but cannot get informed so often by the teams of ADA and COTI

author: tobrien
title: Sustainability & Food Provenance
description: An unmet need to engage with the rest of the world in areas we cannot solve alone.

author: tobrien
title: Conference on No-Code & Blockchain
description: We don't know the global community of Citizen Developers who may play a large role in shaping the future of software.

author: manfo2021
title: Clubs+hackathons = Cardano adoption
description: Independent or one time events do not build a continuous relationship between Cardano promoters and the target audience.

author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: Communication & Outreach
description: Meaningful participation requires an informed and engaged community however Project Catalyst's information flow is disorganized.

author: cryptotexty
title: Cardano Events in Ukraine 20 cities
description: We need to increase meaningful participation among the community. Not familiar with Cardano yet? We are coming to you - to your city or town

author: felixweber
title: Challenge Fest by Catalyst Swarm
description: Challenge Teams and Proposer need a place to connect and to align ideas and actions in a early stage of a Catalyst Funding round

author: felixweber
title: Eastern Town Hall
description: The Cardano & Catalyst Communities in the eastern hemisphere need a entry place to get in touch with Project Catalyst

author: jeffyang1
title: Local Cardano Meetups
description: There is no Cardano Meet up group in San Diego

author: cardanochina
title: Dumpling Twitter Space
description: The English-speaking Cardano audience has limited knowledge about what is happening in China and in the Chinese-speaking Cardano community.

author: emeliasarfo2
title: Grow Afriteen, grow Cardano ERGhana
description: Cardano blockchain knowledge is almost negligible among the youth in the Eastern Region of Ghana in particular.

author: matirdaeg
title: Cardano Creatives Swarm community
description: There is a lack of incentives and environments to allow blockchain use cases a direct interaction with cultural and artistic initiatives.

author: swhitenstall
title: Catalyst Swarm 2022 GitBook
description: Documentation of Project Catalyst requires support to be sustainable.

author: tienna
title: Catalyst Events 4 Vietnam Students
description: Many Vietnam Uni students are unaware of Project Catalyst's funding campaigns and the opportunities that exist.

author: favourse.com
title: Co-Creating Events Together
description: There is no easy way for the Cardano/Catalyst-community & new people to connect to each other, suggest & vote for events to be co-created

author: felixweber
title: Bridge Builders - Governance Events
description: We need a open and safe place for the community & entities to come togther and to discuss Governance topics and themes from bottom up

author: wadaghana
title: Mass Cardano Education for Students
description: Education is key to adoption and use of a service. How can we educate students in Northern Ghana about Cardano Ecosystem and its benefits?

author: quest.zwerg
title: #G4L Gaming Expo-Festival 2022 GSA
description: Would like to present the Cardano Catalyst Gamers On-Chained Challenge to the European Indie Games Community and Consumers in 2022.

author: jeffrey.downard
title: Redeploy Catalyst
description: How to grow new Cardano communities with unique goals?

author: demingfactor
title: Add a calender for community events
description: It can be hard to stay across all the events that are happening within the community and also know what events are upcoming.

author: iosman
title: Africa's reliance on donations
description: Africa relies primarily on donations to survive although it is among the richest continents on earth. Skills and resources aim for finance

author: callyfromauron
title: QA-DAO Transcription Service
description: Without transcription, timestamps, or summaries, the Zoom videos of community events are  inaccessible and difficult to communicate.

author: tevosaks
title: Mini Proposal Workshops
description: Proposers don't have the experience to make their proposals understandable for voters

author: raz
title: Cardano event in a Parisian Theatre
description: Knowledge and awareness of Cardano and Project Catalyst, in French, in Paris, is lagging behind the English speaking world.

author: cornl
title: Cardano local live events - Poland
description: There is a real "need" of live local crypto events in Poland. Why not under Cardano brand? Let's popularize our favourite ecosystem together

author: pierre
title: MetaCenter: Cardano + Metaverse
description: There is no space that would provide an immersive and interactive experience of communication and networking for Cardano community meetings.

author: cryptotexty
title: Cardano goes to Milan
description: Can we organise an high-quality event in Italy, to attract/interact with a good number of people interested in the Cardano Ecosystem?

author: erasmus
title: Conservation factory phase 1
description: Competing demands, eg. over fishing, bad agricultural practices leading to the degradation of a lake ecosystems affecting local livelihoods.

author: felixweber
title: NFT Guild
description: There is a friction of the CNFT Space & Project Catalyst. A lack of communication and collaborations forces us to build silos.

author: reginawills
title: Build Cardano community in Tanzania
description: Lack of awareness of Cardano ecosystem in Tanzania

author: thecatalystschool
title: Insight Sharing Workshops - TCS
description: The Catalyst members struggle to take full advantage of the Insight Sharing stage to improve their awareness about challenges.

author: hyrmes
title: Catalyst Snippets via Social Media
description: Catalyst requires an educated voting body. However many ADA holders are not active in voting rounds, nor do they understand the proposals.

author: cardano4climate
title: Cardano4Climate Community Events
description: Cardano's impact on Climate Change must be measurable. Events & meetings are crucial to connect local challenges & mission-driven solutions

author: azlankonma
title: KONMAHOOD - Defining Communities.
description: A true democratic community platform to learn, synergize & share opinions can only exist in a decentralized space. Problem? It doesn't yet.

author: heartbeat.team
title: Project Catalyst HeartBeat
description: Long form content requires more time and energy to investigate and digest than many members of Project Catalyst can commit to regularly.

author: busyguy1
title: The Cardano Classroom
description: Early education sorely lacks curriculum on financial independence, even less so on blockchain, increasing the wealth gap.

author: gabrielaxel
title: Collaborat'n for global risk issues
description: World is rife with existential risk issues, with no ways to orchestrate communities to develop solutions that address it head on.

author: nftdao
title: Social Media For Blockchains
description: As the world of crypto continues to expand and become more interoperable their will be a need vet individuals for blockchain knowledge.

author: nftdao
title: College Student Recruitment
description: As new career opportunities being to emerge from the increasing use of blockchain technology students will need mentorship opportunities.

author: cobblecat
title: Catalyst Infosessions in Ethiopia
description: People outside the community are not getting information about Catalyst in Ethiopia

author: awuraadwoa
title: Educating head porters in vocations
description: Girl child labour is an issue in Ghana, where young females especially from the north are used to carry goods from one location to another.
